infoHints.mainInfoMessage:
Welcome to your mining room! This is your main space, here you can place racks and miners — the main source of mining power. Besides, here you can see your PC, avatar, and trophies.
The left panel also contains mining performance metrics (both yours and global) and the Daily & Weekly Quests window.
infoHints.powerPartitionInfoMessage: Here you can split your power among the coins you want to mine. Choose the coin(s), and enter which percentage of your total power you want to allocate to each one. Please note that the total percentage can’t be more than 100.
infoHints.questsInfoMessage: Quests provide you with additional rewards for completing tasks. You can complete Daily and Weekly Quests. Make sure to finish the tasks before the timer runs out!
infoHints.powerChartTitleInfoMessage: Here you can see the current Network Power, Block Reward, and Block Time for each crypto coin. You can also select a specific time period and check the data in dynamics.
infoHints.salesAndPopularInfoMessage: Here you can check time-limited offers and get exclusive in-game items.
infoHints.craftingOfferInfoMessage: Here you can create a miner from Parts that you have. You can see which amount of Parts of specific grade you need to craft the miner, what’s the cost in RLT and how much time does it take. If you do not want to wait - you can always pay some RLT to achieve the miner instantly!
infoHints.craftingOfferInterstellarInfoMessage: GET AURORA CITADEL NOW! Create the final miner with 9,750,000 Gh/s by merging all 9 spaceships into one mega Galactical Station!
infoHints.seasonStoreInfoMessage: Season Store is a special store available during the Event Pass only. Here you can buy unique seasonal items with Roller Season Token (RST).
infoHints.specialEventStoreInfoMessage: Burning shop is a special store available during Burning events. Here you can buy unique items with Event Coins (ECOIN).
infoHints.eventPassInfoMessage:
Event Pass — a special event that allows you to get a bunch of unique rewards for passing levels. Complete Event Quests, gain XP to pass levels, and grab exclusive in-game items!

Event Pass contains free and paid rewards. Free rewards can be received by every player, while paid rewards can be received by Premium Event Pass owners only.

Players can get all the rewards without completing Event Quests by purchasing a Complete Event Pass.
infoHints.marketMinersInfoMessage: In this section you can buy miners to mine crypto in your room.
infoHints.lootBoxesInfoMessage: In this section you can purchase lootboxes to get random in-game items.
infoHints.marketRacksInfoMessage: In this section you can buy racks that are needed to place miners in your mining room.
infoHints.marketSkinsInfoMessage: In this section you can purchase an exclusive design for your mining room.
infoHints.avatarHatsInfoMessage: In this section you can get different hats for your avatar.
infoHints.marketTrophiesInfoMessage: In this section you can check your trophies. They can be obtained from the Event Passes and other in-game events.
infoHints.storeTooltipText: Welcome to the Store! Here you can buy different items that will help you mine crypto in your mining room.

electricityTooltipText.electricityText: allows your miners to stay active and mine cryptocurrency.
electricityTooltipText.freeCellText: the first cell in the bar, which can be recharged for free (just click the charge button). This cell needs to be recharged every 24 hours.
electricityTooltipText.premiumCellText: three additional cells which can be recharged with one battery. They will keep your miners active for 3 more days.
electricityTooltipText.batteriesText: special items needed to recharge battery cells. You can get batteries as drops from mini-games or purchase them on Marketplace.

myPowerTooltipText.subtitle: Miners
myPowerTooltipText.descr: — raw mining power from miners set in your room.
myPowerTooltipText.descr2: — additional mining power from Collection Bonus. Equals
myPowerTooltipText.descr2_2: . Include NFT bonus for NFT avatar.
myPowerTooltipText.descr3: — additional mining power from miners set on special racks. Equals
myPowerTooltipText.descr3_2: for each individual miner on a special rack.
myPowerTooltipText.descr4: — raw temporary mining power from winning games.
myPowerTooltipText.descr5: — temporary mining power as a reward from events and games drops.
myPowerTooltipText.descr7: — includes all applicable bonuses and penalties from above. Your current total mining power.

infoHints.networkPowerTooltipText: Here you can see the Network Power — the sum of all players’ power in the game.
infoHints.blockRewardTooltipText: Block Reward is something you share with all players who mine this coin. The size of your personal piece depends on the ratio of your mining power to the total Network Power. The more power you have – the more coins you get every 10 minutes when the block is mined!

million.minerInfo1: By purchasing at least one RollerFamily miner, your account automatically enters the giveaway of 100 RollerMillion 2 (2.000.000 Gh/s) miners!
million.minerInfo2: The giveaway will be made as soon as all RollerFamily miners are sold out.
million.minerInfo3: Celebrate RollerCoin’s 2 Million Users event with not one but two of the most powerful miners! RollerFamily ({{power}} Gh/s) stock is limited to only {{countForSale}} pieces!
million.minerInfo4: Additional 250 RollerFamily miners are reserved for the special giveaway! You can check it out right here:
million.limit: *You can buy only {{limitPerUser}} miners on your account

game.page1_disc: To start mining, you need power! You can get it by playing games and collecting miners.
game.page2_disc: You can find games by clicking on this big blue button.
game.page3_disc: One way to get crypto is to install miners. You can get miners by playing games, you can also win them in events or simply buy them. To install your miners you need to place them on the rack in your mining room.
game.page4_disc: Participate in events, complete Daily & Weekly Tasks, visit the Marketplace and don't forget about Merging - there are so many ways to get the desired miner!
game.page5_disc: Before start, go to your profile and set your’s nickname and avatar!

choose_game.page1_disc: You can get your mining power if you play games here.
choose_game.page2_disc: The game you win gives you power only for 24 hours or more, depending on your PC level.
choose_game.page3_disc: You level up with each 3rd successful game, but if you don't play for 12 hours, the difficulty will go down.
choose_game.page4_disc: And yes, your rewards increase with the new levels, so don't lose your time and start now. Good Luck!

event_pass.page1_disc: A new season starts every few months, in which you can get unique rewards: from miners to RLT or even crypto.
event_pass.page2_disc: To claim rewards you need to level up your Season Pass. To level up, you need Experience Points (XP).
event_pass.page3_disc: You can get Experience points from your Daily bonus and Weekly quests.
event_pass.page4_disc: If you want to get access to all unique season rewards, you can upgrade Season Pass with RLT.
event_pass.page5_disc: In the Event Pass, you can get the special currency of the season - RST. It can be spent on unique seasonal goods and also on lootboxes from the Store.

shop.page1_disc: Here you can buy various goods: from miners to racks for them!
shop.page2_disc: Everything in the Store is represented by RLT - the RollerCoin in-game currency.
shop.page3_disc: To buy a product, select it, then specify the quantity and click the Buy button.
shop.page4_disc: The Store has different categories: miners, racks, lootboxes and much more! So don't forget to check and grab what you want!

wallet.page1_disc: In RollerCoin you can mine different currencies!
wallet.page2_disc: The main currency of RollerCoin is RLT. It is designed so that you can buy various goods in the game and thereby increase your mining opportunities.
wallet.page3_disc: To buy RLT, select the Wallet from which you want to top up your account, and then enter a certain amount of RLT.
wallet.page4_disc: Congratulations! The Hamster recommends spending it wisely! Some sweet powerful miners is waiting for you It's time to check that Marketplace!

season_store.page2_disc: Here you can buy seasonal items for the unique currency - RST. You can get RST for completing Daily & Weekly Quests, and from various events happening in the game.
season_store.page3_disc: In the Season Store you will find products available only within a certain season. So don't miss them!

marketplace.page1_disc: Here you can buy various goods from other players or sell them yourself.
marketplace.page2_disc: Use filters and a search box to find the things you need.
marketplace.page3_disc: To buy a commodity, select it in the “Buy” section and select the quantity.
marketplace.page4_disc: To sell, select it, and specify the quantity and price.

merge.page1_disc: Here you can combine miners and parts into their upgraded versions.
merge.page2_disc: Each item has its own recipe. For miners, it's parts, RLT, and two miners with a level below.
merge.page3_disc: Once you have all the needed recipe components, you can merge them. Just press the button!
merge.page4_disc: You can also improve the parts. Just like miners, they have different levels and recipes.

tips.tip1: The power you gain from games is not permanent and will decrease over time.
tips.tip2: With the higher difficulty, the game becomes more challenging, and the reward increases.
tips.tip3: The rack is needed to place your miners in the room.
tips.tip4: You need to win at least 1 game within 24 hours to maintain your PC level.
tips.tip5: RollerCoin is a crypto mining simulator with millions of users around the world!
tips.tip7: The cooldown time is increasing with the amount of games you play daily.
tips.tip8: You can mine several coins at the same time by clicking on the "SPLIT POWER" button.
tips.tip9: Network Power shows the mining power of all players mining each coin.
tips.tip10: Season Pass is a time-limited event with unique rewards.
tips.tip11: You can get XP for Event Pass by completing Event Quests
tips.tip12: Miners in RollerCoin can't mine at a loss.
tips.tip13: Take a break every 25 hours of gaming!
tips.tip14: Follow our socials! Right now! You can find them below :^)
tips.tip15: Bitcoin was released by Satoshi Nakamoto in January 2009.
tips.tip16: Those players who joined the game with a referral link get 1000 Satoshi of referral bonus.
tips.tip17: Block reward is distributed every 10 minutes.

flagsConfig.unique: This is a non-repeatable reward that can be claimed only once. You can not reclaim it when getting all rewards again.
